name: Bilingual Treatment Referral Line
short_desc: Offers a free and confidential helpline available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to provide referrals to local drug and alcohol treatment facilities
description: Offers a free and confidential helpline available 24 hours a day, 7 days a week to provide referrals to local drug and alcohol treatment facilities. The specialists are fluent in English and Spanish.
